speaker: user
message: Hello PERSON_LASTNAME_1, I'm looking for HLA Hart's 'Law, Liberty and Morality'. Is there a soft copy I can access?

message: Could you direct me to any other websites SMU has access to which might have it?

speaker: user

speaker: helpdesk
message: I'm afraid that we only have hardcopies available in the Reserves collection:

speaker: helpdesk
message: Sorry, I may not understand your question. According to our records, we only have the hardcopies available in the Reserves collection:

speaker: helpdesk
message: There is no sofycopy available for SMU community to access.

speaker: helpdesk
message: In fact, if there's any softcopy, we would be able to find it on the Library Search.

speaker: helpdesk
message: So, you'll have to visit the Reserves collection in person to access the hardcopy book.
